languages.text: {n}Кассия коротко кивает.{/n} "А мой Атлас... намного сильнее прочих. Атлас самой Тисифоны — так всю жизнь шептались за моей спиной, хоть наверняка никто и не знал. А я... всегда подозревала. Просто не хотела признаваться самой себе".

traits.locale_text: {n}Кассия коротко кивает.{/n} "А мой Атлас... намного сильнее прочих. Атлас самой Тисифоны — так всю жизнь шептались за моей спиной, хоть наверняка никто и не знал. А я... всегда подозревала. Просто не хотела признаваться самой себе".

languages.text: {n}Cassia nods.{/n} "But my Atlas is... much more powerful than the others. It's the Atlas of Tisiphone herself — that is what people have whispered behind my back my whole life, although no one knew for certain. But I... I always suspected. I simply did not wish to admit it to myself."
languages.original_text: {n}Кассия коротко кивает.{/n} "А мой Атлас... намного сильнее прочих. Атлас самой Тисифоны — так всю жизнь шептались за моей спиной, хоть наверняка никто и не знал. А я... всегда подозревала. Просто не хотела признаваться самой себе".

It's the Atlas of Tisiphone herself — that is what people have whispered behind my back my whole life, although no one knew for certain. But I... always suspected. I simply did not wish to admit it to myself."

{n}Cassia nods.{/n} "But my Atlas is... much more powerful than the others. It's the Atlas of Tisiphone herself — that is what people have whispered behind my back my whole life, although no one knew for certain. But I... always suspected. I simply did not wish to admit it to myself."

{n}Cassia nods.{/n} "But my Atlas is... much more powerful than the others. It's the Atlas of Tisiphone herself — that is what people have whispered behind my back my whole life, although no one knew for certain. But I... always suspected. I simply did not wish to admit it to myself."

{n}Cassia nods.{/n} "But my Atlas is... much more powerful than the others. It's the Atlas of Tisiphone herself — that is what people have whispered behind my back my whole life, although no one knew for certain. But I... always suspected. I simply did not wish to admit it to myself."

languages.text: {n}卡西娅点了点头。{/n}“但我的圣仪……比其他人的圣仪要强大得多。它是提西福涅曾用过的圣仪，至少别人一直都是在背后这么说的。虽然没人能确信这一点，但我……我一直都怀疑这其实就是真相，我只是不想面对它罢了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia nods.{/n} "But my Atlas is... much more powerful than the others. It's the Atlas of Tisiphone herself — that is what people have whispered behind my back my whole life, although no one knew for certain. But I... I always suspected. I simply did not wish to admit it to myself."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅点了点头。{/n}“但我的圣仪……比其他人的圣仪要强大得多。它是提西福涅曾用过的圣仪，至少别人一直都是在背后这么说的。虽然没人能确信这一点，但我……我一直都怀疑这其实就是真相，我只是不想面对它罢了。”

languages.original_text: {n}Cassia nods.{/n} "But my Atlas is... much more powerful than the others. It's the Atlas of Tisiphone herself — that is what people have whispered behind my back my whole life, although no one knew for certain. But I... always suspected. I simply did not wish to admit it to myself."

languages.text: {n}Cassia asiente.{/n} «El caso es que mi Atlas es... mucho más poderoso que los otros. Es el Atlas de la propia Tisiphone. La gente lleva susurrándolo a mis espaldas toda mi vida, aunque nadie pueda saberlo a ciencia cierta. Pero... siempre lo he sospechado. Es solo que no quería admitirlo».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia nods.{/n} "But my Atlas is... much more powerful than the others. It's the Atlas of Tisiphone herself — that is what people have whispered behind my back my whole life, although no one knew for certain. But I... I always suspected. I simply did not wish to admit it to myself."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia asiente.{/n} «El caso es que mi Atlas es... mucho más poderoso que los otros. Es el Atlas de la propia Tisiphone. La gente lleva susurrándolo a mis espaldas toda mi vida, aunque nadie pueda saberlo a ciencia cierta. Pero... siempre lo he sospechado. Es solo que no quería admitirlo».

languages.text: {n}カシアはうなずく。{/n}「ですが私のアトラスは…他のものよりずっと強力なのです。それはティシフォンのアトラスそのものなのです。だからこそ、私はこれまでもずっと陰口を囁かれてきました。それが確かなことだとだれも知らずにいながら。でも私は…ずっと疑っていました。ただ、自分では認めたくなかっただけなのです」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia nods.{/n} "But my Atlas is... much more powerful than the others. It's the Atlas of Tisiphone herself — that is what people have whispered behind my back my whole life, although no one knew for certain. But I... I always suspected. I simply did not wish to admit it to myself."

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアはうなずく。{/n}「ですが私のアトラスは…他のものよりずっと強力なのです。それはティシフォンのアトラスそのものなのです。だからこそ、私はこれまでもずっと陰口を囁かれてきました。それが確かなことだとだれも知らずにいながら。でも私は…ずっと疑っていました。ただ、自分では認めたくなかっただけなのです」

languages.text: {n}Cassia nickt.{/n} "Doch mein Atlas ist ... viel mächtiger als die anderen. Es ist der Atlas von Tisiphone persönlich — das haben die Leute mein ganzes Leben lang hinter meinem Rücken geflüstert, auch wenn niemand es mit Gewissheit weiß. Aber ich ... habe es immer vermutet. Ich wollte es mir nur nicht eingestehen."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia nods.{/n} "But my Atlas is... much more powerful than the others. It's the Atlas of Tisiphone herself — that is what people have whispered behind my back my whole life, although no one knew for certain. But I... I always suspected. I simply did not wish to admit it to myself."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia nickt.{/n} "Doch mein Atlas ist ... viel mächtiger als die anderen. Es ist der Atlas von Tisiphone persönlich — das haben die Leute mein ganzes Leben lang hinter meinem Rücken geflüstert, auch wenn niemand es mit Gewissheit weiß. Aber ich ... habe es immer vermutet. Ich wollte es mir nur nicht eingestehen."

languages.text: {n}Cassia hoche la tête.{/n} « Cependant, mon Atlas est... bien plus puissant que les autres. Il appartenait à Tisiphone elle-même. C'est ce que tout le monde a toujours murmuré dans mon dos, en tout cas, même si personne n'en avait la certitude. Quant à moi... je m'en suis toujours doutée, mais je refusais simplement de l'admettre. »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia nods.{/n} "But my Atlas is... much more powerful than the others. It's the Atlas of Tisiphone herself — that is what people have whispered behind my back my whole life, although no one knew for certain. But I... I always suspected. I simply did not wish to admit it to myself."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia hoche la tête.{/n} « Cependant, mon Atlas est... bien plus puissant que les autres. Il appartenait à Tisiphone elle-même. C'est ce que tout le monde a toujours murmuré dans mon dos, en tout cas, même si personne n'en avait la certitude. Quant à moi... je m'en suis toujours doutée, mais je refusais simplement de l'admettre. »

languages.text: {n}Cassia başıyla onaylıyor.{/n} "Benim içimdeki Atlas ise diğerlerinden daha güçlü... Benimki, bizzat Tisiphone'nin Atlası... Ömrüm boyunca insanlar arkamdan bunu fısıldasa da kimse emin olamamıştı. Be... Bense daima şüphe ettim. Bunu kabul etmek istemedim."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia nods.{/n} "But my Atlas is... much more powerful than the others. It's the Atlas of Tisiphone herself — that is what people have whispered behind my back my whole life, although no one knew for certain. But I... I always suspected. I simply did not wish to admit it to myself."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia başıyla onaylıyor.{/n} "Benim içimdeki Atlas ise diğerlerinden daha güçlü... Benimki, bizzat Tisiphone'nin Atlası... Ömrüm boyunca insanlar arkamdan bunu fısıldasa da kimse emin olamamıştı. Be... Bense daima şüphe ettim. Bunu kabul etmek istemedim."
